s: Leading a quintet that includes front-line trumpeter Charles Tolliver and saxophonist/clarinetist Greg Tardy, along with a rhythm section of bassist John Herbert and drummer Eric McPherson, Hill's newest offering, "Time Lines" regales listeners with his engaging brand of supremely cerebral ...

t: Andrew Hill - Andrew Hill - Spiral - Lp Vinyl Record - Amazon.com Music
s: Like many people, I owned Hill's Point of Departure on CD and absolutely loved it. When I saw a used vinyl copy of Spiral on eBay, I decided to take the plunge. Spiral was recorded in 1974, and it's a departure from his earlier work. In particular, although there are two different drummers ...

t: Amazon.com: Black Fire[Blue Note Tone Poet Series] [LP]: CDs & Vinyl
s: Andrew Hill's Black Fire is both the pianist/composer's debut and an acknowledged masterpiece of modern post-bop jazz. Featuring a quartet with tenor saxophonist Joe Henderson, bassist Richard Davis, and drummer Roy Haynes, the music still sounds as fresh today as it did the day it was recorded in 1963. Blue Note Tone Poet Series features all-analog, remastered 180-gram vinyl ...

t: Black Fire - Amazon.com Music
Passing Ships [VINYL] by Andrew Hill: Amazon.co.uk: CDs & Vinyl
Amazon.com: Black Fire: CDs & Vinyl
s: Andrew Hill is probably my favorite recording artist with Monk, J Mac and Bobby Hutcherson. I consider all his recordings 5 stars except ANDREW on Blue Note with John Gilmore 10 stars. ... Far out and wonderful. ... I have this on cd, but when I saw it on vinyl, I bought it.

t: Amazon.com: A Beautiful Day, Revisited: CDs & Vinyl
s: If you're an Andrew Hill fan, this is a divine blessing. I liked it so much I bought the CD as well. It's a gorgeous feather in his cap. Like Passing Ships? Then this X Large personnel will blow your mind.

t: Hill, Andrew - Judgment! [Vinyl] - Amazon.com Music
s: La discographie du pianiste et compositeur Andrew Hill chez Blue Note pendant les années 60 est impressionnante et ce Judgment! fait parti de cette flopée d'albums épatants. Notons le point d'exclamation dans le titre, une astuce marketing fréquemment utilisée par le label mythique (l'album It's Time! de Jackie McLean en est même recouvert) pour stimuler la curiosité de l'acheteur parcourant un bac à vinyles...

t: Andrew Hill - Judgment - Amazon.com Music
s: Modern recordings which have been ... good as vinyl. CD’s are often unfairly criticised for being poor quality. This is not the case, it is the original recording or the process which is to blame. Modern “remasters” can both enhance and degrade a recording. The statement GIGO (Garbage In Garbage Out) is the limiting factor. Ignore this at your cost. ... QUEL PLAISIR D'ENTENDRE A HILL ET B ...

t: Black Fire: Amazon.co.uk: CDs & Vinyl
Amazon.com: Andrew Hill - the Complete Remastered Recordings: CDs & Vinyl
s: These recordings escaped me first time around but are demonstrative of how good the jazz scene was in the 1980's. At the time I was aware of Andrew Hill's reputation but the contemporary scene seemed so vibrant that I overlooked him until the late 1990's when I became switched on to his playing.
